Throughout the year, observe children &: Mo teng ga ngwaga,nna kelothloko mo baneng mme o nne le bo kelothlogo jwa gago
Let's pretend you're tracking progress f: A re dire e kete o sala morago tswelopele ya ngwana o bidiwang Themba . Tobetsa fano go simolola!
You will be shown the right assessment f: Otla bontshwa kgotsa go kaelwa thlathlobo dingwaga tsa ngwana
Pretend that, while observing Temba, you: Dira e kete, fa ontse o nna kelothloko mo go Themba , o mo bona gore wa tshega.Tobetsa “Ee”go araba!
Great!\n\n If you are not sure if Temba: Go siame!Fa o sa dumele gore Themba a ka dira sengwe,o ka thlopa “Ga ke itse”
Some questions have pictures attached.\n: Dipotso tse dingwe di nale ditshwantsho tse di kgomagantsweng.
Tap close to hide the picture and go bac: Tobetsa go tswala go fithla setshwantsho mme wa boela morago kwa go se selatedisang tswelopele.
You can always leave the progress tracke: O ka nna wa tlogela go latedisa kgatelopele mme wa bowa moragonyana go fetsa.Dikarabo tsothle tsa gago ditla bolokiwa.Tobetsa fano.
When you have answered all the questions: Fa osetse o arabile dipotso tse tsohle tsa gago,o ka direla mothlokomedi pego kgotsa o ka leba dikarabo tsa gago gape.
You can see all of your completed report: O ka bona pegelo tsothle tsa gago tse di feditsweng kwa morago mo tsebeng ya dipegelo tsa motheo.
